short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial Extension: Suggests top 10 most plausible words based on the current state of your game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unofficial extension for Wordle to suggests top 10 most plausible words in the next attempt of your game. The words are recommended by analyzing your previous attempts as well as calculating the frequency of each letter in the dictionary. The 10 words with highest scores are displayed to you.
